economy_summary: The global economic landscape on December 14, 2025, presents a complex picture of growth initiatives, market volatility, and geopolitical tensions. China is actively working to stabilize and grow its economy, with the NDRC targeting consumption boosts and the Ministry of Finance planning ultra-long-term special treasury bonds for investment. The marine economy is showing strong growth. Globally, central banks are signaling a major policy divergence, with Japan raising rates and many developed economies ending their easing cycles, while the Federal Reserve may consider solitary rate cuts next year, creating potential market volatility. Investment opportunities in China and Western Europe are highly favored by global billionaires. However, significant risks persist. Wall Street warns of a potential US stock market crash triggering a recession in 2026. Geopolitical tensions are elevated, marked by US personnel attacks in Syria, Israeli military actions in Lebanon and Gaza, and Venezuela seizing a China-tied tanker. Corporate financial health faces scrutiny, with Vanke's debt extension failure and a slowdown in China's A-share M&A activity. The tech sector is mixed, with AI storage booming and humanoid robotics showing strong growth and IPOs, but AI product launches (GPT-5.2) are receiving poor reviews, and US tech stocks saw declines (Broadcom). Regulatory clarity for crypto banking in the US offers a bullish outlook for digital assets, while precious metals like gold and platinum are attracting strong investor interest amid global uncertainties.

items.title: GPT-5.2已上线24小时：差评如潮！
items.impact: AI sector, Large Language Model developers
items.summary: GPT-5.2, released 24 hours ago, has received overwhelmingly negative reviews, indicating potential issues with the new AI model.

items.summary: Vanke's three debt extension proposals were rejected by bondholders, though the company has a five-working-day grace period, raising concerns about its financial stability.

items.title: 朱雀三号回收失利细节公布：火箭在距离地面几公里的位置、发动机最后一次点火时，出现异常燃烧，未能实现软着陆
